title: Ultra-mini Bluetooth 2.0 Adapt
description: With the Targus USB 2.0 Micro Bluetooth Adapter, you can transfer files, synchronize your PDA and smart phone contacts and calendar with Microsoft Outlook, use your phone as a wireless modem to connect to the Internet or networks, and connect multiple devices (mice, keyboard, keypad) wirelessly to your PC. Easily print from your phone or PC to a Bluetooth printer, fax from your PC through your smart phone, and much more with this easy to use adapter.
